description: The OR_LOG_ANES_NOTES table contains anesthesia notes from the Log record.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANESTHESIA_NOTES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the anesthesia notes associated with this log.
